room_title: Escape room "Cabin in the Woods" by Conundrum Escape Rooms in Denver
review: The Cabin in the Woods room is INSANE. So many moving parts, things to do. Do NOT attempt this with two people, you wonâ€™t get out. We got out by calling the ranger with two SECONDS left on the clock

room_title: Escape room "Cabin in the Woods" by Conundrum Escape Rooms in Denver
review: We had a great time at Conundrum.  Although we didn't escape the Cabin in the Woods, we had a great time.  The staff is very friendly and helpful and the props are pretty cool.  We will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Cabin in the Woods" by Conundrum Escape Rooms in Denver
review: The Cabin in the Woods was well designed and had a great narrative. There were many really fun puzzles. We'll return to play more!

room_title: Escape room "Cabin in the Woods" by Conundrum Escape Rooms in Denver
review: Terrific setup! Varied, interesting, and challenging puzzles. Wonderful experience for veterans and novices alike. Looking forward to more rooms here.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin in the Woods" by Conundrum Escape Rooms in Denver
review: We had a blast as a family at Conundrum. Our four kids ages 8-14 thoroughly enjoyed the experience and so did my husband and I. Well done! We will be back for more.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin in the Woods" by Conundrum Escape Rooms in Denver
review: I scheduled a room for my family and the next day found out that my son wouldn't be able to get in town till the day after. I called to see if they would allow us to move the day and time and they were very accommodating. We had so much fun. And the puzzles kept you engaged the whole time. We will be coming back to do other rooms as they become available.
